name: XTM Inc.
tagline: Driven by Logic & Insight, Lit Up Through Artistry
description: XTM is a full-service agency with offices in Toronto, Miami, and the United Kingdom. The agency acts as an on-demand, outsourced marketing department for a few global 1000 companies, and provides advertising: creative and production; public relations; and social community management to a number of Canadian and US entrepreneurial and global 1000 companies.
